Goal Representation:
behavior use_remote_control_to_turn_on_tv(remote_control:item, tv:item):
    body:
        achieve is_off(remote_control)
        # Ensure the remote control is initially off
        
        achieve close(remote_control, tv)
        # Ensure the remote control is close to the TV for effective usage
        
        achieve facing_char(char, tv)
        # Ensure the character is facing the TV while using the remote
        
        achieve is_on(tv)
        # Turn on the TV using the remote control

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and id[remote_control]==2052
        # Select the remote control with ID 2052
        
        bind tv: item where:
            is_television(tv) and id[tv]==410
        # Select the television with ID 410

        use_remote_control_to_turn_on_tv(remote_control, tv)
